name: unresolvable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a problem or disagreement) not able to be solved or ended: Generally, these kinds of problems rarely turn out to be unresolvable. Civil wars are often the result of deep-rooted and seemingly unresolvable disagreements. Synonym
insoluble
More examplesFewer examplesI was once again in the midst of a seemingly unresolvable situation. She resigned, citing unresolvable disagreements with the management.They had allowed their debt position to become hopeless and unresolvable. If you have an unresolvable problem, you can take your complaint to the ombudsman.
